trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] format images.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來編碼的編碼器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]格式影像。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-bmpsharpinitcap-md.md)] format does not support features that are supported by other bitmap formats, including global preview, global thumbnail, global metadata, frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-bmpsharpinitcap-md.md)]格式不支援其他的點陣圖格式，包括全域預覽、 全域縮圖、 全域中繼資料、 框架層級的縮圖、 多個框架和框架層級的中繼資料所支援的功能。

trans-unit.source: Encoding does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 編碼不在部分信任中運作。

trans-unit.source: See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for information on partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapEncoder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BmpBitmapEncoder"></xref>類別。
